name: OperatorStore
description: Permissions are stored as a uint256, with each boolean bit representing whether or not an oporator has the permission identified by that bit's index in the 256 bit uint256. Indexes must be between 0 and 255. The directory of permissions, along with how they uniquely mapp to indexes, are managed externally. This contract doesn't know or care about specific permissions and their indexes. Addresses can give permissions to any other address to take specific actions throughout the Juicebox ecosystem on their behalf. These addresses are called `operators`.

eventDecorators.name: SetOperator
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

functionDecorators.name: hasPermission
functionDecorators.description: Whether or not an operator has the permission to take a certain action pertaining to the specified domain.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The account that has given out permission to the operator.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: The domain that the operator has been given permissions to operate.

returnDecorators.description: Whether the operator has the specified permission.

functionDecorators.name: hasPermissions
functionDecorators.description: Whether or not an operator has the permission to take certain actions pertaining to the specified domain.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The account that has given out permissions to the operator.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: The domain that the operator has been given permissions to operate.

parameterDecorators.name: _permissionIndexes
parameterDecorators.description: An array of permission indexes to check for.

returnDecorators.description: Whether the operator has all specified permissions.

functionDecorators.name: permissionsOf
functionDecorators.description: The permissions that an operator has to operate on a specific domain.

parameterDecorators.name: _operator
parameterDecorators.description: The operator to give permission to.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: The domain that the operator is being given permissions to operate.

parameterDecorators.name: _permissionIndexes
parameterDecorators.description: An array of indexes of permissions to set.

parameterDecorators.name: _operators
parameterDecorators.description: The operators to give permission to.

parameterDecorators.name: _domains
parameterDecorators.description: The domains that can be operated. Set to 0 to allow operation of account level actions.

parameterDecorators.name: _permissionIndexes
parameterDecorators.description: The level of power each operator should have.
